## :package: Installation

You can install **northstar** from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/northstar")
```

## :beginner: Usage

```{r setup, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(northstar)
library(dplyr)
```


## Return Information about HCPCS Code

```{r}
hcpcs_search(hcpcs    = "33935", 
             state    = "GA", 
             locality = "01", 
             mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
```



```{r}
rvu(hcpcs = "V5299") |> 
  glimpse()
```

```{r}
gpci(state    = "GA",
     locality = "01",
     mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
```


```{r}
pfs(hcpcs    = "11646", 
    mac      = "10212",
    locality = "99") |> 
  glimpse()
```


```{r}
calculate_amounts(
  wrvu  = 6.26,
  nprvu = 7.92,
  fprvu = 4.36,
  mrvu  = 0.99,
  cf    = 32.744,
  wgpci = 1,
  pgpci = 0.883,
  mgpci = 1.125
)
```
